script.name: pm_wm.getAttributeName
script.label: Get Attribute Name
script.script: /* * Returns the converted name of the attribute * * @author Daniel Gomes * @date 2014/07 * * @param {string} attributeName * @param {string} language of the description * * @return {string} new attribute name */ var attributeNameSub = attributeName.substr(0,32); var description = pm_wm.getValueFromCT('pmNameConversionCT', attributeNameSub, true); return description ? description : attributeName;
